allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial release of JOURNEL v0.1.0

JOURNEL is an ADHD-friendly project organization and tracking system.

Features:
- Zero-friction CLI commands (jnl status, jnl log, etc.)
- Plain text storage (Markdown + YAML)
- Context restoration for picking up where you left off
- Gentle gate-keeping to prevent project-hopping
- Completion rituals to celebrate finishing projects
- LLM-friendly data format for AI analysis
- Git integration for version control
- --no-emoji flag for ASCII-only output

Commands implemented (14 total):
- journel init - Initialize JOURNEL
- journel new - Create projects with gate-keeping
- journel status - Project overview (default command)
- journel log - Quick activity logging
- journel ctx - Export context for LLMs
- journel done - Completion ritual with celebration
- journel resume - Context restoration
- journel list - Project filtering
- journel edit - Quick file editing
- journel link - Add GitHub/Claude URLs
- journel wins - Show completions & streaks
- journel stats - Analytics & insights
- journel ask - Formatted questions for AI
- journel note - Quick note capture
- journel sync - Git remote sync
EOF
)")
